value.title: Format Negative Numbers with Red Brackets in Power BI

value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead. Often, you would want all months (Jan-Dec) to be shown, regardless of whether data is present
